translation.en: Ready or not, here I come.
You'll stay with Aunt May and Uncle Ben for a little while.

Cool. Can you take pictures of my boyfriend's car?

translation.en: That's really nice of you. Wow, that's such a nice thought.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll have a look at the old....

translation.fr: - Oui, monsieur. - Tu tiens à ce skate ?

Eat your vegetables, Gordon. Come on!
No, I'm not gonna take a picture of it. Put him down, man.
Get up! Come on! Come on! Get up!
...we still on for after school today?

I thought that was great what you did.

translation.en: It was stupid, but it was great.
You should go to the nurse. You might have a concussion.

translation.en: I'd still go to the nurse though.
I'm making spaghetti and meatballs tonight.
Since when don't you like spaghetti and meatballs, huh?

-Where's the flood? -Follow me. I'll show you.

translation.en: This has got to be the fill line.
That's the only thing that makes any sense.
No, not tonight. I'll go by the hardware store tomorrow.

translation.en: Good deal. And meanwhile, put this on your face.

translation.en: Come on. I know a right cross when I see one.

Un plombier ne répare pas les appareils

translation.en: -Yeah. -He asked us to keep it safe.
He saw it in the window of that leather shop over on 9th Avenue.
translation.fr: Il l'avait vue chez le maroquinier de la 9e Avenue.

translation.en: He was 19. What does a 19-year-old kid need with a briefcase?

translation.en: And guess who sold it to him.
translation.fr: Et devine qui la lui a vendue ?

translation.en: He asked you to keep this safe? There's nothing in here.

translation.en: Have you looked? There's nothing here.
Your father was a very secretive man, Peter.
Who's that? Do you know who that is?
Some guy who worked with your dad, I guess.

translation.en: Just take this off the table, all right?
We're gonna eat. Off. And wash your hands.

translation.en: I need you to be a good boy.
There's something your mom and I have to do.
translation.fr: Maman et moi, on a quelque chose à faire.
"Zéro, zéro, algorithme du taux de régression."
Ça va ? - Oui. Quoi ? - Mon Dieu,

translation.en: Hell, I stopped being able to help with your homework when you were 10.

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is...
...I know it's been rough for you without your dad.

translation.en: And I know we don't talk much about them.
translation.fr: Je sais qu'on en parle peu.

translation.en: -Yeah, it's all right. -No, it is not all right.

translation.en: I wish I could change it, but I can't.

translation.en: That's the name of the guy in the picture with your dad.
translation.fr: Le nom du type sur la photo avec ton père.

translation.en: They worked together for years and they were close.
But after that night, we never saw him again.

translation.fr: Je viens voir le Dr Connors.

translation.en: Right. You'll find yourself to the left.
You are here for the internship?
You'll find your badge to the left.

translation.en: -Having trouble finding yourself? -No. Yeah, I got it.

translation.en: Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn...
translation.fr: Née de l'esprit de notre fondateur, Norman Osborn,

translation.en: ...the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.
translation.fr: la Tour Oscorp abrite 108 étages d'innovation.

translation.en: Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical...
translation.fr: Nos esprits scientifiques repoussent les limites de la défense, de la biomédecine

translation.fr: Nos esprits scientifiques repoussent les limites de la défense, de la biomédecine et de la chimie. Le futur prend forme ici.

translation.en: I'm Gwen Stacy, a senior at Midtown Science...
translation.fr: Gwen Stacy, en terminale à Midtown Science.
Je suis en charge des stages,

translation.en: I'll be with you for the duration of your visit.
Look, listen. Tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here.
translation.fr: Dites-leur que Rodrigo Guevara est en bas !

translation.en: I guess I don't need to tell you what happens if you forget.

translation.fr: Bienvenue. Je suis le Dr Curtis Connors.

translation.en: Yes, in case you're wondering, I'm a southpaw.
I'm not a cripple, I'm a scientist...
translation.fr: Pas un estropié, un chercheur. La référence en herpétologie.

translation.en: ...and the world's foremost authority on herpetology.
translation.fr: un chercheur. La référence en herpétologie.

translation.en: That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.
Like the Parkinson's patient who watches on in horror...
translation.fr: Mais telle la malade de Parkinson, horrifiée par son corps

translation.en: ...as her body slowly betrays her... ...or the man with macular degeneration...
translation.fr: qui la trahit, ou l'homme atteint de dégénérescence maculaire

translation.en: ...whose eyes grow dimmer each day, I long to fix myself.
translation.fr: et dont la vue décline, je brûle de me réparer.

translation.en: I want to create a world without weakness.
translation.fr: Je veux créer un monde exempt de faiblesse.

translation.en: Anyone care to venture a guess just how?
translation.fr: Qui se risque à deviner comment ?
Prometteur. Mais je pense à une solution

translation.fr: à la disparition des neurones produisant

translation.fr: a la faculté de régénérer ses cellules.

...to the woman you're talking about, that's that. She's....

translation.en: Yeah, you just have to look past the gills on her neck.

translation.en: If you'd like to gather round.
Welcome to Oscorp's tree of life.

translation.en: The idea was so simple. You load it with an antigen.
translation.fr: Une idée très simple. Chargée d'un antigène,

You're a lot like your father.

translation.en: Where are you going to find the people to volunteer?
As far as anyone's concerned, it's for a flu shot.
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Si l'on croit à un vaccin antigrippal.

translation.en: I might think the Veterans Hospital is a place to start.
translation.fr: L'hôpital des Vétérans serait un bon début.

translation.en: It's a little late for shock and indignation.
translation.fr: Il est tard pour le choc et l'indignation.

translation.en: I have no idea what you're talking about.
On you, it's a cheap suit, as it was then.
translation.fr: Cette posture ne vous sied pas.

translation.en: I had nothing to do with that.
Is that what you told his son?
translation.fr: Vous avez dit ça à son fils ?

translation.en: I don't know what you're saying.
You don't know, or you don't wanna know?
translation.fr: Ou vous ne voulez pas comprendre ?
Je vais vous rafraîchir la mémoire.

translation.en: Richard Parker said just about the same thing then that you are saying now.
translation.fr: Richard Parker avait dit la même chose que vous.

translation.en: The clock is ticking, Dr. Connors.
The formula is ours now anyway.
translation.fr: La formule nous appartient de toute façon.

translation.en: Say goodbye to that arm you have dreamed of.
translation.fr: Dites adieu à ce bras tant rêvé.

translation.en: Have your office cleared out by the morning.
translation.fr: Videz votre bureau pour demain matin.

translation.en: Your toys can be taken away too, you know.
translation.fr: Vos jouets peuvent vous être confisqués à vous aussi.
Lundi, groupe B. On est jeudi.

translation.en: Maybe I got a rash or....
It's bad. Have you gone to the nurse?
No, no. I know. I know.
...you can come to this address at 8:00 tonight.
translation.fr: viens à cette adresse à 20 h ce soir.

translation.en: It's apartment 2016. I didn't write that part down.
How did you get out there?
-This is your room. -Yes, this is my room.
No, it's impressive. They actually held together very well.
translation.fr: Non, c'est impressionnant. Elles ont bien tenu.

translation.en: You have your suit in there?
It's for dinner. Are you gonna--?
-You must be Peter. -Dad, this is Peter.
translation.fr: Tu dois être Peter. Papa, voici Peter.

translation.en: The car is taking him to the Veterans Hospital in Brooklyn.
translation.fr: Le chauffeur le conduit à l'hôpital des Vétérans.

translation.en: You have to stop him. He--
I would, but I always lose him on the bridge.
translation.fr: Le réseau passe mal sur le pont.

translation.en: I'll make sure Dr. Ratha returns your call as soon as possible.
translation.fr: Je demanderai au Dr Ratha de vous rappeler vite.

translation.en: I'm going to Holton Avenue, across the river. I'm in a hurry.
translation.fr: Je vais avenue Holton, après le fleuve. Je suis pressé.

translation.en: You want me to take the tunnel or the bridge?
translation.fr: Je prends le tunnel ou le pont ?

translation.en: Hey, you all right back there?
The head goes on the other--
Help Gwen's friend with his fish.
-Tell us about your day. -Did you catch that spider guy yet?
translation.fr: - George, ta journée ? - Papa, tu as eu le mec-araignée ?

translation.en: No, we didn't catch him yet.
But we will. He's an amateur...
translation.fr: Mais on l'aura. C'est un amateur

translation.en: ...who's assaulting civilians in the dead of night.
translation.fr: qui agresse des civils en pleine nuit.
Il est maladroit, il sème des indices,

translation.en: I mean, I saw that video...
...with him and the car thief, and....
I think most people would say that he was...

translation.fr: La majorité des gens aurait tort.

translation.en: If I wanted the car thief off the street, he'd already be off the street.
translation.fr: Si je voulais coffrer le voleur, ce serait déjà fait.

translation.en: The car thief was leading us to the people who run the operation.
translation.fr: Il nous conduisait aux cerveaux de l'opération. Six mois à monter ce coup.
Six mois à monter ce coup.

translation.en: It's called strategy. I'm sure you're aware of the term?
You've heard about that in school?
translation.fr: Nul doute que tu as appris le terme stratégie à l'école.
Nul doute que tu as appris le terme stratégie à l'école. Bien.

translation.en: -He didn't know you had a plan. -You seem to know...
translation.fr: - Il ignorait tout de votre plan. - Tu es bien informé.

translation.en: ...a lot about this. Know something we don't?
-Whose side are you on? -I'm not on anyone's side.
-I saw a video on the Internet-- -You saw the video on the Internet.
translation.fr: J'ai vu une vidéo sur Internet. Tu as vu ça, donc l'affaire est élucidée.

translation.en: -Well, then the case is closed. -Well, no.
If you watch the video-- Maybe send you a link?
translation.fr: La vidéo montre... Je vous enverrai un lien.

translation.en: It looks like he's trying to help.
On the Internet he's being made out to look like a hero.
translation.fr: Bien sûr, sur Internet, il est montré comme un héros masqué.

translation.en: No, no. I'm not saying he's a hero.
translation.fr: Je ne dis pas que c'est un héros.

translation.en: -What are you trying to say? -He's trying to help.
translation.fr: - Tu dis quoi ? - Il semble intervenir

translation.en: He's trying to do something the police can't.
-I don't know. -What do you think we do?
-...with our thumbs planted up our asses? -George.
translation.fr: et en se curant le cul ?

translation.en: He stands for what you stand for.
translation.fr: Il veut la même chose que vous,

translation.en: Protecting innocent people from bad guys.
I stand for law and order. That's what I stand for.
translation.fr: Je veux la loi et l'ordre.

translation.en: This guy wears a mask like an outlaw.
translation.fr: Ce type porte un masque comme un bandit.

translation.en: He's hunting down criminals that all look the same...
translation.fr: Il pourchasse un profil de criminels,

translation.en: ...like he's got some sort of personal vendetta.
But he's not protecting innocent people, Mr. Parker.
translation.fr: Mais il ne protège pas les innocents.

translation.en: -Dad, we need to talk. -Yes, we do.
translation.fr: - Papa, faudra qu'on parle. - En effet.

translation.en: I'm sorry if I insulted you. It was not my intention.
translation.fr: Pardon si je vous ai insulté.

translation.en: -You're welcome. -Branzino was real good, Mrs. Stacy.
translation.fr: - De rien. - Votre loup était délicieux.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I thought he was going to arrest me at one point.
translation.fr: Je suis désolé. J'ai cru qu'il allait m'arrêter.

translation.en: No, I wouldn't have let him arrest you.
-What happened to your face? -I wanna tell you something.
translation.fr: - T'as quoi au visage ? - Je vais te dire un truc.

translation.en: Okay, okay, okay. I gotta tell you this one thing.
translation.fr: Je dois te dire un truc.

translation.en: I gotta tell you this one thing about the vigilante and the car thief.
translation.fr: C'est à propos du justicier et du voleur.
du justicier et du voleur. Quoi ?

translation.en: Forget that. I won't talk about that.
-I'm gonna talk about me, okay? -What about you?
translation.fr: - je vais parler de moi. - Je t'écoute.

translation.en: It's impo-- I wish I could just--
I can't. It's hard to say.
Your father wants you to come inside.
translation.fr: Ton père veut que tu rentres.

translation.en: Will you please find out what is going on, Alfred?
translation.fr: Allez voir ce qui se passe, Alfred.

translation.en: Somebody help! Help me! My kid is trapped!
translation.fr: Au secours ! Aidez-moi, mon fils est coincé !

translation.en: Just a normal guy, all right?

translation.fr: On va te sortir de là.

translation.en: Okay, look. I'll undo the belt.
You hold on to that seat in front of you. On three?
translation.fr: Je détache ta ceinture. Tiens-toi au siège devant toi. A trois.

translation.en: See how easy that was? You did a great job.
translation.fr: C'était facile, pas vrai ? Tu as été super.

translation.en: There you go. That's it. That's it, buddy.
Do me a favor. A little faster, okay, bud?
You're doing great, buddy. You're doing great.
...9 p.m. last night, an incident took place on the Williamsburg Bridge.
translation.fr: un incident s'est produit sur le pont de Williamsburg.

translation.en: Much of what occurred is speculation at this point.
translation.fr: Ce qui s'est passé n'est encore que spéculation. Cependant, plusieurs témoins,

translation.en: However, several eyewitnesses to the crime...
...as well as our own preliminary findings...
translation.fr: ainsi que nos premières constatations, ont confirmé

translation.en: ...have positively placed one individual at the scene.
translation.fr: la présence d'un individu sur les lieux.

translation.en: ...for the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man.
translation.fr: contre le justicier masqué, surnommé Spider-Man.
Qui d'autre est au courant ? Y a que toi.

translation.en: You don't believe what the police are saying, do you?
translation.fr: Tu ne crois pas la police, dis-moi ?

translation.en: What did that thing on the bridge look like?
translation.fr: A quoi ressemblait cette chose sur le pont ?

translation.en: It was real big. Too big to be human.
translation.fr: C'était super gros. Trop pour être humain.

translation.en: Whatever was attacking them would have killed them.
translation.fr: Ce truc qui les attaquait les aurait tués.

translation.en: So I gotta go after it.
It was good for me too.
translation.fr: j'ai trouvé ça bon, moi aussi.
Ce n'est pas bien de fouiner.

translation.en: I gave everyone the week off.
translation.fr: Je leur ai donné leur semaine.

translation.en: No, I got a free track.
translation.fr: J'ai un trou entre deux cours.

translation.en: I wanted to ask you a question.
How would a predator track a reptile?
translation.fr: Comment un prédateur chasserait un reptile ?
Ça n'arrive pas. Les reptiles dominent

translation.en: Most reptiles are at the top of their respective food chain.
translation.fr: Ça n'arrive pas. Les reptiles dominent leur chaîne alimentaire.

translation.en: Why the sudden interest in the cold-blooded?
translation.fr: Un soudain intérêt pour les sang-froid ?
Des fiches de biologie à faire.

translation.en: So because of the cold blood...
translation.fr: Leur sang froid les rendrait sensibles

translation.en: ...would they react to changes in temperatures?
You'd have to catch one first.
Did you know there's a rumor of a new species in New York?
translation.fr: Tu as entendu parler d'une nouvelle espèce à New York ?

translation.en: What do you know about it? You seen it?
Never been better, Peter. Never been better.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais été aussi bien. Jamais.

translation.en: Afraid I have to ask you to leave.
I have a new project I'm working on. I need to be alone.
translation.fr: de partir. Je démarre un projet confidentiel.

translation.en: Don't worry, Mr. Parker. I'll be back.
Mr. Mayor, if there was a giant dinosaur running around...
translation.fr: M. le maire, si un dinosaure se baladait à Manhattan, vous le sauriez.

translation.en: ...you would be the first to know.
So tell your son he can rest easy, all right?
translation.fr: Votre fils peut donc dormir tranquille.

translation.en: Yeah. You and me both, sir.
-Mr. Parker, why are you not in school? -Got a free track.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas - en cours ? - J'ai un trou entre deux cours.

translation.en: Fine, there may not be a dinosaur running around.
There is something more dangerous, and I know who.
translation.fr: mais un truc plus dangereux. Et je le connais.

translation.en: ...who's my daughter's mentor. Is that who?
translation.fr: - Egalement le mentor de ma fille. - Celui-là ?

translation.en: Recently, Dr. Connors gave Gwen a glowing college recommendation.
translation.fr: Il a fait à Gwen une lettre élogieuse pour la fac.

translation.en: It was beautiful. When I read it, I cried.
...that he is running around dressed up like a dinosaur?
translation.fr: Tu veux me faire croire qu'à ses moments perdus, il se déguise en dinosaure ?

translation.en: Not dressing up and not a dinosaur. He has transformed himself into a lizard.
translation.fr: Ni déguisé, ni dinosaure. Il est devenu un lézard géant.

translation.en: Let me ask you a question.
Do I look like the mayor of Tokyo to you?
translation.fr: Est-ce que je ressemble au maire de Tokyo ?

translation.en: I'm telling you the absolute truth.
This man has worked for his whole life on cross-species genetics.
translation.fr: Cet homme a consacré sa vie au transfert génétique.

translation.en: He lost an arm, he tried to grow it back, but the equation was imbalanced.
translation.fr: Il a perdu un bras et il veut le remplacer. L'équation bancale

translation.en: He has turned into a lizard. He's using lizard DNA.
translation.fr: et l'ADN de lézard l'ont changé en lézard.

translation.en: He is dangerous, and he is planning something horrific. I know. I know.
translation.fr: Il est dangereux, et il prépare un truc horrible.

translation.en: Okay. All right, I get it.
You'll go back to hanging out with the citizens of Tokyo.
translation.fr: Tu retournes voir les citoyens de Godzilla Park

translation.en: I'm gonna go back to protecting the citizens of this fine, fair city of ours.
translation.fr: et je retourne protéger les citoyens de notre belle ville.

translation.en: Sergeant Butler, please escort Mr. Parker back to school.
translation.fr: Sergent Butler, veuillez raccompagner Parker à l'école. Capitaine, je déconne pas.

translation.en: Captain Stacy, I'm not messing around.
translation.fr: à l'école. Capitaine, je déconne pas.

translation.en: Just bring him in. Just call him in. You have to call him in.
He is a danger to everybody.
Get me everything we have on Dr. Curtis Connors.
translation.fr: Je veux tout ce qu'on a sur le Dr Curtis Connors,

translation.en: Blood panels reveal lymphocyte and monocyte readings...

translation.fr: Taux de coagulation en forte hausse.
de la force et de l'élasticité.

translation.en: Subject no longer requires corrective lenses.
translation.fr: Le sujet n'a plus besoin de verres correcteurs.

translation.en: This is no longer about curing ills.
translation.fr: Il ne s'agit plus de guérir des maladies.

translation.en: In attempt to redress regenerative relapse...

translation.fr: le dosage a été augmenté à 200 milligrammes.
Je deviens plus puissant chaque jour !

translation.en: Also, my father is under the impression...

translation.fr: que tu as besoin d'un soutien psychiatrique.

translation.en: You should see the other guy.
The other guy, in this instance, being a giant mutant lizard.
translation.fr: L'autre étant, en l'occurrence, un lézard géant mutant.

translation.en: Do you want cocoa? Howard's making some.
translation.fr: tu veux un chocolat ? Howard en prépare.

translation.en: No, Dad, I do not want cocoa.
I remembered somebody saying her fantasy was to live in a chocolate house.
translation.fr: Quelqu'un m'a dit qu'elle rêvait d'une maison en chocolat.

translation.en: I can't have cocoa right now because I'm work--
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas boire de chocolat à cause de mes dev...

translation.en: I feel kind of pukey and just sort of....
translation.fr: J'ai envie de gerber et je suis, comment dire,

translation.en: -Like, emotional. I keep crying. -It's okay. Good.
Every day, for as long as I can remember...

translation.fr: J'ai toujours vu mon père partir le matin

translation.en: ...and he's put a badge on his chest...
translation.fr: avec un insigne sur la poitrine

translation.en: ...and strapped a gun to his hip.
translation.fr: et une arme à la ceinture.

translation.en: And every day, for as long as I can remember...
...I haven't known if he was gonna make it home.
I have to, because I created him.
translation.fr: Il le faut, parce que je l'ai créé.
Je lui ai donné une équation
qui est à l'origine de tout ça.

translation.en: Something my father had been working on, you know.
translation.fr: Un projet sur lequel mon père travaillait

translation.en: Secretly. Now I realize why he kept it a secret.
translation.fr: en secret. Je comprends qu'il l'ait gardé secret.

translation.en: Point is, this is my responsibility.
Let's just get out of here.
Just for a minute. Can we?
If my parents see me leaving, I'm dead.
translation.fr: Si mes parents me voient sortir, je suis morte.

translation.en: Your parents aren't gonna see you leaving.
translation.fr: Ils ne te verront pas sortir.

translation.en: I'm not the one who needs help.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas moi qui ai besoin d'aide.

translation.en: There will be no more loneliness...

translation.fr: Une distribution à toute l'espèce ferait progresser

translation.en: ...could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
translation.fr: Une distribution à toute l'espèce ferait progresser l'humain d'un point de vue évolutif.

translation.en: One has to adapt to survive.
"That, changing like the snake, I might be free...
translation.fr: "En muant tel un serpent, je pourrais à mon gré

translation.en: ...to cast off flesh wherein I dwell confined."
translation.fr: rejeter cette chair dans laquelle je suis confiné."

translation.en: Would you give it all up...
...after all you know you can do?
translation.fr: Renoncerais-tu à tout ça, à tout ce potentiel ?
A tout ce pouvoir qui t'habite ?

translation.en: You're not gonna get in the way of my plan, Peter Parker!
translation.fr: Tu ne vas pas contrarier mes plans, Peter Parker !

translation.en: I can save them. I can cure them.
translation.fr: je peux les sauver je peux les guérir.

translation.en: There's no need to stop me, Peter.
-I'm gonna throw you out the window. -What?
translation.fr: Je vais te jeter par la fenêtre.
On a été un vilain lézard.
Ici le lieutenant Williams, de la police

translation.en: ...from the New York City Police Department.
translation.fr: Ici le lieutenant Williams, de la police de New York. Nous avons cerné le bâtiment.
de New York. Nous avons cerné le bâtiment.

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm okay. I'm in the sewer, tracking him.
translation.fr: Tout va bien. Je le suis dans les égouts. Je dois l'arrêter d'urgence.

translation.en: I gotta stop him before anyone gets hurt.
translation.fr: Je le suis dans les égouts. Je dois l'arrêter d'urgence.

translation.en: -Do you know how to run a serum? -I do it all the time.
translation.fr: - Tu sais fabriquer un sérum ? - J'en fais pour Connors.

translation.en: Okay, great. Okay, I need you to go to Oscorp.
I need you to access the cross-species file. It's a blue serum.
translation.fr: Ouvre le fichier transfert génétique. Un sérum bleu.

translation.en: I spent my life as a scientist trying to create a world without weakness...
translation.fr: Je n'ai cessé de vouloir créer un monde exempt de faiblesse.

translation.en: I sought to create a stronger human being...
translation.fr: J'ai cherché à créer un humain plus fort,

translation.en: Human beings are weak, pathetic, feeble-minded creatures.
translation.fr: Les humains sont faibles, misérables et crétins.

translation.en: ...when we can be so much more?
translation.fr: quand on peut être tellement plus ?

translation.en: This is my gift to you.
translation.fr: Ceci est un cadeau pour vous.

translation.en: We have a confirmed sighting, sir. The Lizard's headed toward Canal Street.
translation.fr: Visuel confirmé. Le Lézard va - vers la station Canal Street. - Et Spider-Man ?
- vers la station Canal Street. - Et Spider-Man ? Il était dans le lycée.

translation.en: I want that Spider-Man off the street.
The lizard creature has released a biological agent.
translation.fr: Le Lézard a répandu un agent biologique.

translation.en: All efforts to stop him have failed...
...and he is now proceeding north on 7th Avenue. Over.
translation.fr: Il remonte en ce moment la 7e Avenue. Terminé.

translation.en: You have to get out of there now.
Connors is on the way. He's coming to you right now.
translation.fr: Connors est en route. Il arrive.

translation.en: He needs the device. He's gonna infect the whole city!
translation.fr: Il veut le disperseur. Il va infecter toute la ville.

translation.en: You're gonna wait eight minutes after what I told you?
translation.fr: Tu restes malgré tout ? Les gens vont mourir.

translation.en: Gwen! Gwen! You Mother Hubbard. Are you serious?
Stand down now, or we will open fire.
translation.fr: A terre ou nous ouvrons le feu.

translation.en: You are surrounded. There is no escape.
translation.fr: Tu es cerné. Il n'y a aucune issue.

translation.en: And your daughter's there right now.
Well, Paul, if I didn't see it, I wouldn't believe it.
translation.fr: Paul, faut le voir pour le croire.

translation.en: I won't venture to say what it is crawling up...
translation.fr: Difficile de dire ce qui escalade

translation.en: ...the north side of the Oscorp Tower...
translation.fr: la face nord de la Tour Oscorp,

translation.en: ...but clearly it is not human and it is very, very strong.
translation.fr: mais c'est tout sauf humain, et c'est très, très fort.

translation.en: We're getting the latest details. This is just coming in.
translation.fr: Voici les informations qui nous parviennent.
de tout le sud depuis la 54e Rue.

translation.en: If you are south of 54th Street...
translation.fr: Si vous résidez au sud de la 54e Rue,

translation.en: ...you have to move out of the area immediately.
Spider-Man appears to be heading towards Oscorp.
translation.fr: Spider-Man se dirige vers la Tour Oscorp.

translation.en: ...and it's really not clear if he's gonna make it.
translation.fr: et ce n'est pas sûr qu'il y arrive.
qui a sauvé mon fils sur le pont.

translation.en: Something bad's going down in Midtown.
translation.fr: Il y a un truc grave dans le centre.

translation.en: Still friends with Matthews, that crane operator on 6th?
translation.fr: T'es pote avec Matthews, le grutier de la 6e Avenue ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Get him on the phone for me.

translation.fr: Les flics nous évacuent. On s'en fout !

translation.en: Get him on the phone for me.
Hey, Charlie, get me Enriquez on 54th Street!
translation.fr: Charlie, appelle Enriquez sur la 54e Rue.

translation.en: -You got it. -Angelo, get your mug over here.

translation.fr: Wolski ! Tu vas faire des heures sup.
A toutes les grues de la 6e.

translation.en: ...swing your jib arms over the avenue. Boom angles at 90 degrees.
translation.fr: Tournez vos flèches vers la rue. Positionnez-vous à 90°.

translation.en: Spider-Man needs those big boys high and lined up.
translation.fr: Spider-Man a besoin qu'on aligne nos machines.

translation.en: Let's give him a clear approach. Over.
-I have to get this to Spider-Man. -Get in.
translation.fr: - Je dois donner ça à Spider-Man. - Monte.

translation.en: -It can stop the Lizard. -Get in the car.
translation.fr: Non, ça peut arrêter le Lézard.

translation.en: Your boyfriend is a man of many masks.
translation.fr: Ton petit copain a plusieurs visages.
S'il te plaît, veille sur lui.
Pas de mère. Pas de père.

translation.en: -Okay. -Let's get you out of here. Come on.
translation.fr: On va vous tirer de là.

translation.en: Look at me. Stay with me.
-Help's on the way, okay? -You need to....
You need to be gone when they get here.
translation.fr: Tu dois partir avant qu'ils arrivent.

translation.en: I was wrong about you, Peter.
translation.fr: Je me suis trompé sur ton compte.
Cette ville a besoin de toi.
Tu vas te faire des ennemis.

translation.en: Sometimes the people closest to you.
So I want you to promise me something, okay?

translation.fr: Laisse Gwen en dehors de ça.

translation.en: An eerie calm has set in over New York City.
translation.fr: Un calme étrange s'est installé sur New York.

translation.en: Apparently, some sort of aerosolized antidote...
translation.fr: Apparemment, un antidote gazeux a été vaporisé
un antidote gazeux a été vaporisé de la Tour Oscorp, neutralisant ainsi la biotoxine.

translation.en: ...which seems to have counteracted the biotoxins.
translation.fr: de la Tour Oscorp, neutralisant ainsi la biotoxine.

translation.en: Residents of Lower Manhattan can rest peacefully...
translation.fr: A Manhattan, on peut dormir en paix.

translation.en: ...knowing that the alleged mastermind of this terror plot...
translation.fr: Le cerveau de ce complot terroriste, le Dr Connors, est incarcéré.
de ce complot terroriste, le Dr Connors, est incarcéré.
des coups de fusil et des discours.

translation.en: Two of my teachers showed up.
translation.fr: Deux de mes profs sont venus.
Tout le monde était là, sauf toi.

translation.en: Can't do this. Can't do this.

translation.fr: Je ne peux plus te voir.

translation.en: He made you promise, didn't he?
translation.fr: Il t'a fait promettre, c'est ça ?

translation.en: To stay away from me, so I'd be safe.
translation.fr: De rester loin de moi pour que je sois à l'abri ?
C'est ce qu'avait dit oncle Ben.

translation.en: I'm just no good for her.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas bien pour elle.

translation.en: Peter Parker, if there's one thing you are, it's good.
translation.fr: Peter Parker, une chose est sûre, tu es bien.

translation.en: Anyone has a problem with that can talk to me.
translation.fr: Que celui qui n'est pas d'accord vienne me voir.

translation.en: Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
translation.fr: Peter, je sais que les choses sont difficiles en ce moment.

translation.en: I think I know what you're feeling.
translation.fr: Je crois savoir ce que tu ressens.

translation.en: Ever since you were a little boy...
...you've been living with so many unresolved things.
translation.fr: tu vis avec tant de questions sans réponse.

translation.en: Well, take it from an old man:
translation.fr: Fais confiance à un vieil homme.

translation.en: Those things send us down a road.
They make us who we are.
And if anyone's destined for greatness, it's you, son.
translation.fr: Et si quelqu'un est destiné à la grandeur, c'est toi, mon fils.

translation.en: You owe the world your gifts.
translation.fr: Tu te dois d'offrir tes talents au monde.

translation.en: You just have to figure out how to use them.
translation.fr: Tu dois juste trouver comment les exploiter.

translation.en: And know that wherever they take you...
translation.fr: Et peu importe où ils te conduiront,

translation.en: I had a professor once who liked to tell his students...
translation.fr: J'ai eu un prof qui aimait dire aux élèves

translation.en: ...that there were only 10 different plots in all of fiction.
translation.fr: qu'il n'existe que 10 intrigues, toutes fictions confondues.

translation.en: Well, I'm here to tell you he was wrong.
translation.fr: Je vous dis qu'il avait tort.

translation.en: At least we can always count on you.
translation.fr: Au moins, on peut compter sur vous.

translation.en: Sorry, Miss Ritter, won't happen again, I promise.
Don't make promises you can't keep.
translation.fr: Ne faites pas de promesses en l'air.

translation.en: Yeah, but those are the best kind.
Did you tell the boy the truth about his father?
translation.fr: Lui avez-vous dit la vérité sur son père ?

translation.en: So we'll let him be for now.
